SenderWrapperSender
SendersEndpoint
Wrapper for senders, that allows to get input from a session variable, and to store output in a session variable.
See also
Github - SenderWrapperSender Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.senders.SenderWrapper
Syntax
Copy
<SenderWrapperSender />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
delayTime	number	5000 [ms]
The time in milliseconds the thread will be put to sleep
AbstractSenderWrapper
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
getInputFromSessionKey	text	-
If set, input is taken from this session key, instead of regular input
getInputFromFixedValue	text	-
If set, this fixed value is taken as input, instead of regular input
preserveInput	bool
